thread.title: STUC to address conference in 'historic' first (SNP - Scottish National Party)
thread.title_full: STUC to address conference in 'historic' first (SNP - Scottish National Party) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: STUC to address conference in 'historic' first (SNP - Scottish National Party)
text: ( Source : SNP - Scottish National Party ) The SNP has today announced that the General Secretary of the STUC will address the party's conference in a historic first - as the SNP and Scotland's trade union movement 'stand shoulder to shoulder'
